summary: Completed comprehensive UI/UX testing of INVERA architecture website. All major UI/UX improvements are working excellently including horizontal overflow fixes, navbar improvements, button styling, container centering, form styling, typography, and mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: No horizontal overflow on desktop and mobile viewports
Navbar properly centered in 1200px max-width container with correct margins
Navbar scroll background transition working (transparent to dark with backdrop blur)
Active page indicator showing gold underline on current page
Navbar hover states working on links and GET STARTED CTA button visible with gold border
Hero buttons VIEW PROJECTS (gold fill) and BOOK CONSULTATION (gold outline) properly styled as actual buttons
All LuxuryButton CTAs across site have visible backgrounds/borders/padding
Container centering working with max-w-[1200px] mx-auto px-5 lg:px-8 pattern
Section spacing consistent with py-20 lg:py-28 (112px vertical padding)
Contact form fields have dark background (#111111) with subtle gold borders
Contact form labels in gold color (#C6A86B)
Contact form submit button has gold background with good contrast
WhatsApp CTA uses brand gold palette (#C6A86B) instead of default green
About page hero image with proper gradient overlay
About page vision/mission cards with dark background and gold borders
Typography using Playfair Display for headings and Inter for body text
Footer properly styled with brand colors and gold social icons
Mobile responsive design with working mobile menu toggle
Projects page showing expected empty state due to mocked Supabase API
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
